post_content:
Prefer trade but will take cash offers if there is interest. 

Obvious condition issues but also has a good image and nice Tolstoi back. 

Trade including 51 Mays, 49 Bowman Jackie or Satchel Paige or any Cobb/Ruth/Gehrig preferred but open to any HOFs pre 1956.

Cash either way to balance a deal is ok also.

PM is best way to contact me.
